mapper.select: select distinct br_pbname, br_suplytype, br_housetype,br_brtc, br_recrude, br_winannde, br_suplyint, br_pbid from borrow
select distinct br_pbname, br_pbid, br_suplytype, br_winannde, br_recrude, br_brtc, br_suplyint, br_housetype from borrow where br_brtc=#{br_brtc}
select * from borrow where br_pbid=#{br_pbid} and br_brtc=#{br_brtc}
select br_pbname from borrow where br_pbid=#{br_pbid} limit 1
select * from ( select row_number() over(order by br_sequence desc) as borrow_no, b.* from borrow b) b2 where b2.borrow_no between #{start} and #{end}
